content: Slot 254 VP1565 RDBKZVMG: END /**********************************************************************/ /* Page and Tdisk volumes for Member 2 */ /**********************************************************************/ RDBKZVMH: BEGIN CP_Owned Slot 253 VP1562 CP_Owned Slot 254 VP1566 RDBKZVMH: END 194 Virtualization Cookbook: Vol 1: IBM z/VM 7.2 /* statement. If it becomes necessary to access a local minidisk */ /* from a different member of the SSI cluster operating in REPAIR */ /* mode, simply ATTACH the volume to SYSTEM. */ /**********************************************************************/ /**********************************************************************/ /* Shared User Volumes */ /**********************************************************************/ User_Volume_List VM155F User_Volume_Include VM5* ... ====> file 6. Save your changes with the FILE subcommand. Verify the integrity of the changes with the CPSYNTAX command: ===> access 193 g ===> cpsyntax system config f
